summary: This is an email from August 19, 2019, regarding overtime for August 10, 2019, sent to a Correctional Systems Officer at FCC Butner. It includes an attachment titled 'OVERTIME FOR AUGUST 10, 2019' and contains a standard government security notice about handling sensitive information.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 19, 2019, concerning overtime for August 10, 2019.
It is addressed to a Correctional Systems Officer at FCC Butner in North Carolina.
The email includes a security notice indicating it may contain sensitive information.
The attachment is titled 'OVERTIME FOR AUGUST 10, 2019'.
The document originates from the Epstein case files, suggesting a connection to events at FCC Butner around the time of Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death.
